name: Nursery Magic
paragraph1Desktop: Imagine yourself as a small child. It's snowing outside, and you are tucked in bed, listening to... Twinkle, Twinkle, Little Star.
paragraph2Desktop: Lullabies and nursery rhymes have been around for centuries, and for good reason. Simply clapping along to Itsy Bitsy Spider can help children develop a sense of rhythm, laying the path for their first words and sentences. Music evokes emotions, fosters bonds, and creates a sense of security as it captures a precious childhood moment, a memory that will last a lifetime.
paragraph3Desktop: Explore our lullabies and nursery rhymes
paragraph1Mobile: Discover the power of music and create memories that will last a lifetime.
paragraph2Mobile: Explore our lullabies and nursery rhymes

name: A Toddler's Playground
paragraph1Desktop: Learning starts with as little as a song, a crayon and a coloring book.
paragraph2Desktop: Studies show that music enhances memory retention, language development, and concentration in young children. While delicate music plays in the background, let children color, draw, and trace. Encourage them to go one step further — to write letters, then words, then numbers. But most importantly, set aside a crayon and a piece of paper and join them. And after all that fun, watch a little tale of love together.
paragraph3Desktop: Explore our activity books, ABC books and tender little tales
paragraph1Mobile: Learning starts with as little as a song, a crayon and a coloring book.
paragraph2Mobile: Explore our activity books, ABC books and tender little tales

name: The First Years of School
paragraph1Desktop: Do you remember your first day of school? You waved your mother goodbye and stepped inside, suddenly feeling like a grown-up.
paragraph2Desktop: The first years of school can be a difficult time. Often, children struggle to be away from home, follow teachers’ directions, and interact with their peers — especially when disparities in literacy and numeracy become apparent. Make your classrooms engaging and welcoming for all children. Give every child an opportunity to shine.
paragraph3Desktop: Explore our sing-alongs and little tales
paragraph1Mobile: Make your classrooms engaging and welcoming for all children. Give every child an opportunity to shine.
paragraph2Mobile: Explore our sing-alongs and little tales

name: Through Elementary School
paragraph1Desktop: No child should be left behind.
paragraph2Desktop: The inability to articulate words and understand narratives may leave a young child feeling isolated and afraid of rejection. By pairing slow narration with highlighted text, our stories offer every child the chance to catch up with their reading skills in a positive environment. With every word they speak and every sentence they understand, they will only grow more confident and more motivated to learn.
paragraph3Desktop: Explore our movie-books and musical tales
paragraph1Mobile: No child should be left behind. Offer every child the chance to catch up with their reading skills with our read-along stories and movie-books.
paragraph2Mobile: Explore our movie-books and musical tales

name: Middle School
paragraph1Desktop: Then came middle school, and you wanted to find out who you were...
paragraph2Desktop: Support the social and emotional development of young students as they navigate the delicate transition from elementary to high school. Introduce them to longer, more complex stories written by the greatest authors of all time, whose words will guide them on their journey of self-discovery and social awareness.
paragraph3Desktop: Explore our selection of classic stories and tales
paragraph1Mobile: Support the social and emotional development of young students by introducing them to stories written by the greatest authors of all time
paragraph2Mobile: Explore our selection of classic stories and tales

name: High School
paragraph1Desktop: And in high school, you laid the groundwork for the person you have become.
paragraph2Desktop: As children become young adults, they begin questioning morals, politics, and society. Support their intellectual growth by promoting stories that broaden their understanding of the world around them while injecting a love of humor, mystery, and adventure.
paragraph3Desktop: Explore our Short Stories and Novels
paragraph1Mobile: Support the intellectual growth of your students by promoting stories that broaden their understanding of the world around them while injecting a love of humor, mystery, and adventure.
paragraph2Mobile: Explore our Short Stories and Novels
